title: Does detoxing alcohol, coffee, or sugar actually work? - Natural Health
author: Natural Health editorial team
description: Wellbeing coach Carole Caplin, leading UK homeopath Lyndsey Booth and top naturopathic doctor Nigma Talib team up to bust some January myths about detoxing.
